title: Honoring System
body: Im still honor level 3. I have been getting a lot of honors but I'm still not levelling up. All my friends are honor 4/5 and they barely even play the game... I'm so confused why I'm not honor 4/5. I have been honor 3 for a long time now.

replies.body: There's no visible meter so it's hard to tell, but the key is to stay consistent.  I took a look at your specific account, and I did notice some events where your behavior wasn't the most honorable, which can slow you down a little.  Feel free to reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our PB team can offer more context!
